name: Find Total/Pass Marks - Two Person Comparison
name_hi: दो व्यक्तियों की तुलना से कुल/पास अंक निकालें

signature.embedding_text: A student scored X% marks and failed by X marks while another student who scored X% passed by X marks more than required. Find pass marks or total marks. A candidate scoring X% fails by X marks while another scores Y% and gets X marks more than passing. What is maximum marks for examination.
signature.structure: Two people with different % scores, one fails by X, other passes by Y. Find total or pass marks.

trick.name: Equation Equate Method
trick.one_liner: x% + fail_marks = y% - pass_marks = Pass marks. Solve for total.

steps.action: Write pass marks from both data points
steps.action_hi: Dono data se pass marks likho

trick.memory_hook: Fail wala + karo, Pass wala - karo, dono equal = Pass marks!

common_mistakes.wrong: Fail wale se minus, pass wale se plus
common_mistakes.right: Fail wale se plus (score + fail_by), Pass wale se minus (score - pass_by)
common_mistakes.why: Fail means below pass marks, Pass by X means X marks above pass marks

deep.explanation:
**Core Concept: Both expressions equal Pass Marks**

Student 1: Scored x%, failed by F marks
→ Pass marks = (x% of T) + F

Student 2: Scored y%, passed by P marks
→ Pass marks = (y% of T) - P

**Since both equal pass marks:**
(x% of T) + F = (y% of T) - P
(y - x)% of T = F + P
T = (F + P) × 100 / (y - x)

**Example:**
30% fail by 30, 42% pass by 58
(42-30)% of T = 30 + 58 = 88
12% of T = 88
T = 733.33
Pass marks = 30% of 733.33 + 30 = 250

shortcut.explanation:
**Quick Method:**
1. Marks difference = fail_by + pass_by
2. % difference = y% - x%
3. Total = marks_diff × 100 / %_diff
4. Pass = lower% of Total + fail_by

**Example:** 30% fail by 30, 42% pass by 58
Total = 88 × 100 / 12 = 733.33
Pass = 220 + 30 = 250

instant.explanation: Total = (fail + pass) × 100 / (%diff) | Pass = lower% × T + fail
